snippet: The state attorney general’s office declined to charge Sheriff Paul Babeu of Pinal County over accusations that he misused his authority to harass and intimidate an ex-boyfriend.
abstract: Arizona state attorney general's office declines to charge Sheriff Paul Babeu of Pinal County, Arizona, over accusations that he misused his authority to harass and intimidate ex-boyfriend Jose Orozco.
lead_paragraph: The state attorney general’s office declined to charge Sheriff Paul Babeu of Pinal County over accusations that he misused his authority to harass and intimidate an ex-boyfriend.

headline.main: Arizona: Sheriff Will Not Face Criminal Charges
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Sheriff Will Not Face Criminal Charges
